[b][color=white]HF T-Shirts[/color][/b]
Recently, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has stated in his thread that he might be making HF branded T-Shirts and offering them for Bytes as a reward to the members. As of yet, it is still not certain whether he'll be proceeding with his approach as he is even catching suggestions. Lend him a hand with your genuine opinion(s). [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5891869]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=left][size=x-small][color=white][b]*[/b][/color]As of the Sunday prior to release.[/size][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/j0jX3Yy.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Lower Cost Vaccines may be on the way[/color][/b] 
Thanks to some researchers in Galveston, Texas, we now have a method of reducing costs related to producing and storing vaccines up to 80 percent. According to professor of microbiology, Pei-Yong Shi, this was their process “The ability to eliminate cell culture or eggs and cold storage will change the process of vaccine development. Importantly, this vaccine technology could potentially serve as a universal platform for development of live-attenuated vaccines for many viral pathogens.” The team has their gaze set on first reducing the cost of the vaccine for the impactful Zika virus, with more to come in the future.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.utmb.edu/newsroom/article11934.aspx]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Scientists Cracked the Mystery of Elephant Wrinkles[/color][/b] 
The short answer is evolution. Researchers postulate that each visible crack in their skin has been placed there over millions of years. The wrinkles are to allow them to cool themselves easier as well as fend off parasites. Those without the correct groves under the ever-unforgiving sun did not make it. You may not be wondering why baby elephants don't exhibit these cracks, that would be because they do not become pronounced until later in life. An interesting phenomenon indeed, and now one more that we fully understand. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.inverse.com/article/49479-why-do-elephants-have-wrinkled-cracked-skin]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Chile opens spectacular 1,700-mile trail, connecting 17 national parks[/color][/b] 
News to travelers and those interested made highlights on 5 October. Chile recently opened a 1,740-mile hiking trail, which connects 17 national parks in all. The trail stretches from Puerto Montt in the north of Chile to Cape Horn in its opposite. The trail flows through and near the Andes Mountains, many forests and a few volcanoes. “Douglas Tompkins, the late founder of The North Face, and his wife Kristine McDivitt Tompkins, the former CEO of Patagonia” have established the name of this trail be called the Route of Parks. For some time, the couple purchased millions of acres of land in Chile to preserve it, though, in March 2017, McDivitt Tompkins donated swatches of land roughly the size of Switzerland to the Chilean government so that land could be used to add to or create new national parks.” [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.mnn.com/earth-matters/wilderness-resources/blogs/chile-opens-spectactular-1700-mile-trail-connecting-17-national-parks]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Interpol chief Meng Hongwei vanishes on trip to China[/color][/b] 
After a trip to France, Meng Honwei, China’s chief Interpol representative, has been missing since 25 September. It’s currently in the air for where the chief could have vanished to; however, a French source close to Agence France-Presse (AFP) has assured that he was not lost in France. It’s said by the South China Morning Post that Mr. Meng was ‘taken away’ for questioning when he returned to China. Although there is no clear motive for the investigation being held by ‘discipline authorities,’ it should not be ruled out that he could have potentially angered China. “Meng Hongwei's disappearance seems to fit in with a now familiar pattern among China's senior Communist Party officials. The official in question suddenly drops out of the public eye, and an alarm is raised that the person is "missing," usually by members of the public.” “Since Xi Jinping came to power in 2012, well over a million party officials have been disciplined in some way.” [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-45761466]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
